for (e,f) in zip(PhotonEnergy_RI, RefractiveIndex):
      print(str(e)+"*eV "+str(f))

ElectronEnergy_SCY = [ 0.000, 0.015, 0.020, 0.030,
0.040, 0.060, 0.080, 0.090,
0.105, 0.300, 0.500, 1.000 ]

ScintilYield = [ 0.10, 0.46, 0.60, 0.68,
0.74, 0.80, 0.82, 0.84,
0.87,  0.96,  0.98,  1.00 ]
      

  
for (e,sy) in zip(ElectronEnergy_SCY, ScintilYield):
      scintyield = 0.3*sy*e
      print(str(e)+"*MeV "+str(scintyield))

for (e,f) in zip(PhotonEnergy_FAST, FastComponent):
      print(str(e)+"*eV "+str(f))



PhotonEnergy_RI = [ 1.0, 1.84, 3.5]
RefractiveIndex = [ 1.82, 1.82, 1.82]
for (e,f) in zip(PhotonEnergy_RI, RefractiveIndex):
      print(str(e)+"*eV "+str(f))


PhotonEnergy_ABS = [ 1.00 , 2.82 , 2.88 , 2.95 , 3.02  , 3.10  , 3.18  , 3.26 , 4.08 ]
Absorption = [ 438. , 438. , 413. , 375. , 263.  , 87.5  , 11.5  , 1.0  , 1.0  ]
for (e,f) in zip(PhotonEnergy_ABS, Absorption):
      print(str(e)+"*eV "+str(f)+"*mm")
